testcase.name: testServlet()

failure.message: org.mockito.exceptions.verification.TooFewActualInvocations: servletRequest.getParameter("name"); Wanted *at least* 2 times: -> at com.demo.unittesting.TestMyServlet.testServlet(TestMyServlet.java:28) But was 1 time: -> at com.demo.app.MyServlet.service(MyServlet.java:14)
